Insights¶

Using these endpoints you can view the overall performance of your account through mailing and audience growth aggregates.

GET /#account_id/insights/v2/mailings/summary¶

Get information about current mailings.

Parameters:
  • from_date – Optional parameter that accepts a date string in the format ‘YYYY-MM-DD’, must be specified along with to_date. Set to 30 days prior to current date when none are specified.
  • to_date – Optional parameter that accepts a date string in the format ‘YYYY-MM-DD’, must be specified along with to_date. Set to current date when none are specified.
Returns :

A list of mailing information.

Sample Response [showhide] 
GET /100/insights/hq/mailings/summary
[
  {
    "request": {
        "account_id": 100,
        "from_date": "2019-10-02",
        "timezone": "America/Chicago",
        "to_date": "2019-10-31"
    },
    "summary": {
        "bounces": 2,
        "deliveries": 356,
        "mailings_sent": 1,
        "optouts": 0,
        "total_clicks": 6,
        "total_opens": 195,
        "unique_clicks": 3,
        "unique_opens": 101
    }
  }
]

Sample Response [showhide] 
GET /100/insights/v2/mailings/summary?from_date=2019-09-02&to_date=2019-10-03
[
 {
    "request": {
        "account_id": 100,
        "from_date": "2019-09-01",
        "timezone": "America/Chicago",
        "to_date": "2019-10-31"
    },
    "summary": {
        "bounces": 5,
        "deliveries": 712,
        "mailings_sent": 2,
        "optouts": 0,
        "total_clicks": 12,
        "total_opens": 494,
        "unique_clicks": 5,
        "unique_opens": 205
    }
  }
]

GET /#account_id/insights/v2/audience¶

Get information audience growth information for the account.

Parameters:
  • from_date – Optional parameter that accepts a date string in the format ‘YYYY-MM-DD’, must be specified along with to_date. Set to 30 days prior to current date when none are specified.
  • to_date – Optional parameter that accepts a date string in the format ‘YYYY-MM-DD’, must be specified along with to_date. Set to current date when none are specified.
Returns :

A list of audience growth information by day.

Sample Response [showhide] 
GET /100/insights/v2/audience
[
  {
    "request": {
        "account_id": 1745480,
        "from_date": "2019-10-25",
        "timezone": "America/Chicago",
        "to_date": "2019-10-31"
    },
    "totals": [
        {
            "timestamp": "2019-10-26T03:01:53.678242+00:00",
            "total": 860
        },
        {
            "timestamp": "2019-10-27T03:01:54.140009+00:00",
            "total": 880
        },
        {
            "timestamp": "2019-10-28T03:01:52.151722+00:00",
            "total": 900
        },
        {
            "timestamp": "2019-10-29T03:01:48.642469+00:00",
            "total": 940
        },
        {
            "timestamp": "2019-10-30T03:02:09.739164+00:00",
            "total": 945
        },
        {
            "timestamp": "2019-10-31T03:01:40.403777+00:00",
            "total": 960
        }
    ]
  }
]
